name: Contract and fee-for-service accommodations
text: §571-32.1  Contract and fee-for-service accommodations.  To provide for children under section 571-32, the family court may provide, on a contractual or on fee-for-service basis, accommodations in child caring institutions or foster boarding homes which meet the intent of section 346-17. [L 1980, c 303, §9(2)]
